CheckTitle: TDE is set to Enabled on for applicable database instance
Description: Enable Transparent Data Encryption on every RDS instance. RDS Database transparent data encryption helps protect against the threat of malicious activity by performing real-time encryption and decryption of the database, associated backups, and log files at rest without requiring changes to the application.
Risk: Data at rest that is not encrypted is vulnerable to unauthorized access if the underlying storage media or backups are compromised.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to RDS Console. Go to Data Security -> TDE tab. Find TDE Status and click the switch next to Disabled. Choose automatically generated key or custom key, click Confirm.
